channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Software License Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Software License Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-24711|2024-08-03T19:42:16.146Z -- unknown -- software%20license%20manager
item.description: The del_reistered_domains AJAX action of the Software License Manager WordPress plugin before 4.5.1 does not have any CSRF checks, and is vulnerable to a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2021-24560|2024-08-03T19:35:20.180Z -- unknown -- software%20license%20manager
item.description: The Software License Manager WordPress plugin before 4.4.8 does not sanitise or escape the edit_record parameter before outputting it back in the page in the admin dashboard, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
